entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 11:52 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
